name: fifth-largest by
description:
The game, called 'Gears of War 4,' begins the series with the Nuka World mission 'The Docks.' The story plays out the same, while some new characters join the core cast for a fourth time.
'Nuka World': The fate of Wesker's crew approaching a new mission. We watch the scene unfold. Now, let's spread the word about this absolutely rad video game. The game's trailer is below. What do you think about this? Will you play or return the game?
